Line11.A109C: Turns out you can't do that without paying a high price. (laugh)
Line13.A109C: Don't be scared. The wight never liked rage. I'm safe from her.
Line7.A109C: A druid ritual site. The spirits give power to the rituals we do, and we pay them by being harassed. (laugh)
Line9.A109C: They created the ritual to find the wight. The first half usually quiets your emotions. That way the wight can't manipulate you.
